title: Tour of Britain Women Preview: Top UK Stars vs. Faulkner and the World
content:
Kristen Faulkner, Lorena Wiebes, and Lizzie Deignan — racing in her final edition — headline the field at the four-stage Lloyds Tour of Britain Women.

Read the full article at Tour of Britain Women Preview: Top UK Stars vs. Faulkner and the World on Velo.
author: ahood
